info.brief_description: Two sisters prank each other during one crazy day.
info.description:
Amber, or "Amy", is a senior in high school and is very popular. Her younger sister, Emily is only a couple years younger, so she attends the same high school as Amber. Yet, since they were younger, everyone had taken to call Emily "Little Emily" on account that she was the youngest, and therefore the smallest as well. It was during the last few months that her nickname began to become obsolete. Her height matched her sister's and her body proportions were the same if not bigger than Amber's.

For the past couple years, Amber has been harboring a secret: She fantasizes about being naked in public. The thought of it arouses her as much as it terrifies her, so she is unwilling to act on her desires, especially when she is so well known among her classmates. Emily has somehow become privy to this information, and is excited to see if she can push her sister into unwittingly fulfilling her public nudity fantasy.

This morning is Amber's birthday, and Emily has a special present for her. Of course, this is not without consequences or retaliations. So, unknown to either girl, the events of the morning will have huge consequences throughout the day. Perhaps for the foreseeable future!
